sources.title: Wild Women
sources.description: Title: Wild Women Summary: A small safari in Africa is captured by a tribe of white jungle women. Directed by: Norman Dawn Actors: Lewis Wilson, Dana Broccoli, Frances Dubay Production Company: Norman Dawn Productions Release Date: 23 September 1951 (USA) Aspect Ratio: REMOVE_TAG A group of explorers go to Africa and, after some padded stock footage, come upon a all-white-women of Amazons. The head-Amazon takes a liking to one of the white explorers, as does other tribal-members, and the ladies are soon fighting among themselves for possession. Somehow or another, related to tribal customs, Amazon number one has to wrestle the man for some reason that must have been in the stock-footage.

sources.title: Wild Women (1951) Adventure, Comedy Full length Movie aka Bowanga Bowanga
sources.description:
1000 wild virgins! Without men!  
A small safari in Africa is captured by a tribe of jungle women.

Also Known As: Bowanga Bowanga 
Director: Norman Dawn
Stars: Lewis Wilson, Dana Broccoli, Morton C. Thompson 
Genres: Cult, Classics, Adventure, Comedy
